entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
